mapper.insert: insert into reservation values( reservation_seq.nextval, #{reserStudent}, #{date}, #{reserKey}, TO_DATE(#{reserStart},'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI'), TO_DATE(#{reserEnd},'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') )
mapper.select: select reservation_no as reserNo, reservation_student as reserStudent, reservation_date as reserDate, reservation_key as reserKey, reservation_start as reserStart, to_char(reservation_end,'HH:mi') as reserEnd from reservation where reservation_student=25
